#summary Frequently Asked Questions.

=== I was using the Hibernate Session Plugin. Need migration? ===

The Hibernate Session Plugin will be depreated. Will not be continued. This plugin contain the the Hibernate Session injection feature and much more!


=== What version of Struts 2 can i use with this Plugin? ===

From Struts 2.0.9+ to 2.1.x.


=== Can i use this plugin with Struts 2.0.x Code Behind Plugin? ===

Not tested.


=== Can i use this plugin with Struts 2.1.x Convention Plugin? ===

Yes. This plugin works fine with XML and Annotation mappings.
